input: Execute a batch request to fetch, update, and delete different lock requests at once.

output.body:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET /BankCustomerLockRequests/305 HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

PATCH /BankCustomerLockRequests/420 HTTP/1.1
Content-Type: application/json

{"UserStatusCode":"2","Note":"Updated for compliance."}

--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

DELETE /BankCustomerLockRequests/520 HTTP/1.1

--request-separator--
